main.name: Darian
main.bio: My friends call me D. I love generating ideas, problem solving, and making things happen! I find fufillment in motivating and inspiring others to grow and succeed and I believe there is nothing more powerful than being your authentic self. I am also passionate about exploring emerging technology to improve the lives and well-being of others. When I'm not coding, you can find me camping, hiking, mountain biking, practicing yoga, writing, reading, tending to my plants, or traveling.
